mechanist.name: Mechanist
mechanist.desc: A middle-aged man with a backpack full of tools. His clothes are stained with oil, and he constantly wipes grease off his hands with a rag that somehow only gets dirtier. He whistles quietly.
mechanist.msg1: If you see a toolbox with a red handle, don't touch it. Actually â€” do touch it. Bring it to me.
mechanist.msg2: That toolbox. Did you find it?
mechanist.msg3: I would love to fix the ventilation that failed during the emergency... Maybe it was all my fault...
mechanist.task_msg:
Thank you! I should say, that combining detonator and dynamite could result in a quite a tool as well. But now I can finally try fixing the ventilation to survive here. Here is a little radio I've been working on. Although it doesn't get any signals up here...
... He leaves without making too much noise, as if he was avoiding something...

lost_worker.name: Lost Worker
lost_worker.desc: A pale man in a torn uniform. His eyes track you with slow delay, like he's not fully here. He whispers fragments of instructions that make no sense.
lost_worker.msg2: You need an ID card to leave! Mmmmmmmmm... I've lost mine...
lost_worker.msg3: I've searched everywhere... Maybe I should see in room next to the train... Where my ID could be...
lost_worker.task_msg:
Oh, you found it! I've searched for it for ages... Now I can finally leave...
He starts disappearing, as if he was tearing into small bits and just...

archivist.name: Archivist
archivist.desc: An old person covered in dust, clutching torn folders. Their hands shake as they trace invisible patterns in the air. They ask you questions you don't know how to answer.
archivist.msg1: Oh, Hello. I rarely have any visitors. Can you hand me a log book?
archivist.msg2: Theres log notes and folders lying around, just put them together.
archivist.msg3: I don't know if you've seen them... Everyone hides from light and is scared to death to be in the open...
archivist.task_msg:
Thank you... These logs contain valuable information about people who once were in this place.
 He leaves mumbling and reading the files. Slowly... As if he was crawling...
